topics.body:
Damn...
[spoiler]So if Sakura loses against Yue, the punishment is losing the ability to give and feel love. It's one of those things that sounds goofy but when you stop and actually think about it you realize how truly horrifying it is. Never feeling any kind of love ever again. Not from your friends, family, or even lovers.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.body:
So recap on what happened with me in the last couple of hours

My mom, my cousin, and my aunt all went out to eat, and when they got back to the car to come home it didn't turn back on

The battery isn't the problem either, someone came to jumpstart it

I can't drive, so the only one available to pick them up was my uncle

So we did that, everything went well, and I BSed two pages of an essay in one hour

Overall everything is ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) -and I still don't have my driver's license-
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200
